title: Should i play ranked?
body:
Normal days, I play around 1 normal/2arams and holidays, around 3-5...is this enough practice for ranked?
and...saying that the 4 other people on my team can either be god, shit or troll and im shit but tries not to feed or get in way; if I simply just spam ranked, will I get promoted?

replies.body: i casually played ranked, didn't even make bronze in S1..
1 game a week, you'll be challenger in like a year ;)

Just don't play Ranked.
It'll sink you in to a never-ending world of stress.
:(
that's what I felt before...but now im not rly taking it seriously :P #casuallyplayingranked

Don't play ARAMs to practice for ranked. Spam normals if you want, but normals are not much like playing ranked.

People try harder (and rage harder) in ranked games.
really annoyed with the dodge punishment thing for leaving champion select...so u no longer can leave if theres a toxic player on team

I think that that feature should be removed from ranked, because it is really stupid to identify a toxic player in pre game screen and then have to play the game with the troll or face a punishment for wanting to keep your LP

If you're good you will climb, if you ain't you will go down simple as that.

If you find Ranked fun I can't see why you will not give it a bash.
